title: Resume Building and Personal Branding
description: This chapter focuses on developing effective resumes and establishing a cohesive personal brand for career advancement.
learning_objectives: Identify the essential components of an effective resume
Recognize the importance of personal branding in career development
Develop strategies for highlighting skills and experiences in a resume format
Understand how to tailor resumes for different career opportunities
Create a framework for a personal brand that aligns with career goals

skill_builder.title: Resume Builder
skill_builder.description: Interactive resume creation tool with feedback and templates
